objects.text:
• Durable Synthetic Material
• Spacious Design with Ample Storage
• Gold Hardware Accents
• Perfect Medium Size for Everyday

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This square banner features a modern product advertisement layout for a luxury tote bag. The background employs a soft, layered design with geometric elements like transparent circles and angled shapes, overlaid with two rectangles to form a split-tone effect. Positioned prominently on the right side is a high-resolution product image of a handbag. The title (`heading`) is bold and centered at the top-left in a dark brown color, followed by a refined serif subheading (`subheading`). Product features are listed in a clean, minimal font (`description`). A highlighted price (`price`) stands out in large white text over a muted brown background, next to a rounded rectangle call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled by the `cta` text.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Cream: #F9F5F2  
- Caramel Brown: #C8957A  
- Deep Brown: #6B4226  
- Light Sand: #E8C8B6  
- Accent Gold Stroke: #D4AF37  
- Text Contrast (Dark Chocolate): #3A2A14  
- White Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated handbag in a warm, muted camel brown shade (#B27A58), delivering a classic and elegant look. This dominant color blends seamlessly with the subtle texture of the bag, giving it depth without overwhelming the design. Gold metallic accents (#D4AF37) on the hardware, chain, and embellishments contrast beautifully with the soft brown, adding a luxurious and eye-catching detail. The gold highlights are strategically placed to reflect light, enhancing the premium quality feel. A complementary color palette for an advertisement banner would include Camel Brown (#B27A58), Gold (#D4AF37), Cream (#F5F5DC), and Warm Beige (#E0C6A8).
